Package com.st.BlueSTSDK

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigControl.ConfigControlListener  
    Debug.DebugOutputListener
    Interface used for notify to the user the console activity The data received/send from/to the node are encoded with ISO-8859-1 charset.
    Feature.FeatureListener
    Interface used for notify that the feature updates its data
    Feature.FeatureLoggerListener
    This class permit to dump the feature data, both in raw format (the same that that we receive from the node) and after that we parse it
    Manager.ManagerListener
    Interface used by this class for notify that a new node is discovered or that the scanning start/stop
    Node.BleConnectionParamUpdateListener
    Interface used for notify change on the ble connection
    Node.NodeStateListener
    Interface where notify that the node change its internal state
    NodeEmulator.EmulableFeature
    Interface that the emulated feature have to implement
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigControl
    Class that manage the Config characteristics
    Debug
    Class used for write and read from the debug console
    Feature
    Contains the data and the description of the data exported by the node
    Feature.Sample
    Class that contains the last data from the node
    Manager
    Singleton class that manage the discovery of new BLE nodes
    Node
    Represent an object that can export some data (feature) using the ble connection
    NodeEmulator
    This class represents a node that don't used a ble connection for extract the data but generate fake data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Node.State
    State of the node
    Node.Type
    Node type: type the board that is advertising connection
